version_description: We have a major update that will make BOV Internet Banking more convenient. Update now and check out how your BOV Securekey has become mobile!

Continue using 'Scan Cronto image' or the new 'Signature 2' function for financial transactions done through BOV Internet Banking. This software update replaces the traditional hardware BOV Securekey!
Apple iPhones with iOS 11 and over will be supporte

BOV Mobile just got better!
There’s a new revamped look, new Stop A Card feature and improved security. Carrying your financials has never been so easy.
Update available for iOS 11 devices and over.

BOV Mobile just got better!
There’s a new revamped look, new Stop A Card feature, FaceID and improved security. Carrying your financials has never been so easy.
Bugfixes and performance improvements.
Update available for iOS 11 devices and over.
Pay Third Party feature is here! Send money to anyone you like using an IBAN or account number or BOV credit card.
